html:
Skylum Software is celebrating the third anniversary of Luminar Neo, their flagship image-processing software.

Skylum is continuously adding new features to Luminar Neo, and it never gets stale. You can either go with a subscription plan or go with a Lifetime License for only $119 during the celebration.

Features added in the last few months include; Color Transfer, Twilight Enhancer AI, Water Enhancer AI, Relight AI, HDR Batch Processing.

Luminar Neo also ties in to PhotoShop, Lightroom Classic and macOS as an extension.

There are multiple bundle deals for both new and current customers This promotion runs from today until February 24, 2025

You can get extra savings by using the coupon code CANONRUMORS at checkout.

Skylum is also running a giveaway with some great prizes including a Fujifilm X-M5 and DJI Osmo Pocket 3, as well as some Luminar prizes.

For New Users

  • Luminar Neo Subscription (1 Year)
  • Includes 100 creative assets, free Luminar Neo video course, and 3 months extra subscription for only $69.
  • Learn More

Luminar Neo Lifetime License

  • Includes 100 creative assets, a free Luminar Neo video course, and 3 years of Generative AI tools for only $119.
  • Learn More

For Existing Users

  • Luminar Neo Upgrade Pass
  • Get $33 for the upgrade and 3 months extra subscription.
  • Learn More

Skylum Giveaway Details

Take your creativity to new heights by entering for a chance to win either a Fujifilm X-M5 Camera or a DJI Osmo Pocket 3. Boost your chances by referring friends and completing simple actions to earn points—more points mean better odds of winning!

As a bonus, collect enough points and unlock a Free Luminar Neo License to enhance your photos like never before. Don’t miss this opportunity!

Collect 1,000 Points – Unlock a 20% OFF coupon for Luminar Neo
Collect 3,000 Points – Unlock a FREE Luminar Neo Lifetime License.

Prizes Available

  • Fujifilm X-M5 Camera
  • DJI Osmo Pocket 3
  • And many other Skylum gifts!
  • Learn More

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
